original_text: So when you asked me to come here, I was happy to come. I knew that it was right. So tell me now. Why did you ask me to come?’
korean_text: 부름을 사양하지 아니하고 왔노라 묻노니 무슨 일로 나를 불렀느냐

sentences.original_text: So when you asked me to come here
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신이 여기 오라고 요청했을 때

sentences.original_text: I knew that it was right
Why did you ask me to come?
